addon:addon.name: Stiebel Eltron heat pump Binding
addon:addon.description: This binding is used to communicate Stiebel Eltron LWZ heat pumps via a serial interface. The binding is inspired by the work of [Monitoring a Stiebel Eltron LWZ (http://robert.penz.name/heat-pump-lwz) which is hosted at Heatpumpmonitor (https://launchpad.net/heatpumpmonitor) and is written in Python.
